attributes.action: force Chelsea, Man U, Arsenal and Liverpool to stop talking about the European super league and actually do it.  By doing this the rest of us can have proper football back with less diving cheating over paid prima donna's and a chance for anyone in the top division to actually win the title. These four clubs can then do what they love most, count their TV money, and leave us in peace to enjoy proper football again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
